terminology.territory: Geographic zone grouping accounts by regional biotech ecosystem (city clusters, not states)
terminology.piston: Territory as revenue engine component - each fires in sequence to drive regional growth
terminology.bookings: Won opportunity amount (contract value at close)
terminology.egp: Estimated Gross Profit (projected margin at booking)
terminology.gp: Actual Gross Profit (realized margin after delivery)
